thread.title: brings Android Nanodegree program to India with Udacity and Tata Trusts
thread.title_full: Google brings Android Nanodegree program to India with Udacity and Tata Trusts - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: brings Android Nanodegree program to India with Udacity and Tata Trusts
text: Google today announced a program in partnership with Udacity and Tata Trusts to offer Android Nanodegrees in India. This is essentially an education credential for developers to help them learn new skills. Google in association with Tata Trusts will be offering 1,000 scholarships to students across India. Currently, India, with 3 million software developers has the second largest developer population in the world. By 2018, India is expected to have 4 million developers to become No.1 developer population. “While India has millions of software developers, we still lag behind in creating world-class apps. With the launch of this program we want to bridge the gap by providing India’s developer community an easy access to learn and build high quality apps »
